title: Husires
author: Husires
content: My suggestion may be silly or lazy, but I think that most of those who click on the “glow” button they modify the code to yellow, and I do not remember anyone using it in red, so if this modification is simple, I hope that the basic color/Default color will be changed to yellow.Old styleNew styleCode:[glow=red,2,300][/glow][glow=yellow,2,300][/glow]

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: If you're talking about the glow option in the posting options, i guess changing the default color to different one changes nothing, i mean it is there to be changed by the user in the first place. It's looks like changing the default font face "verdana" to other font when clicking the option which solves nothing coz it's there to be changed.If there's something need to update in that posting tags option, i guess its the "url" tag, make the "=" as default there and looks like Code:[url =][/url]since it's needed and its one of the used tags.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I am trying to remember a post that uses the glow affect, but honestly I can't do it. I have no doubt that people are using the code though, and I agree with OP's suggestion. If given a choice between using the red or the yellow color, I would rather pick yellow. It looks more pleasant with the background color of the forum and isn't as aggressive as the red one. Even the pink and orange ones are easier to look at. The only ones worse than red are the navy blue and maroon options if your text is black. Yuck.
